markdownRemark.html:
Recently I came across an interesting problem of building an API rate limiter. While doing a bit of research on the same, I came across various algorithms and approaches. Some of the popular algorithms used to implement rate limiting are:

  • Token bucket
  • Leaky bucket
  • Fixed window counter
  • Sliding window log
  • Sliding window counter

This post is NOT about these algorithms. I will try and explain an alternative approach here which makes use of certain Redis specific features. I would love to know any constructive criticism/feedback on it. Please let me know in the comment section below.
